name: c-blob-survival
description: A small chaotic vampire-survivors inspired game written in C and raylib
readme_summary: Blob Survival is a small, chaotic game written in C and raylib, drawing inspiration from Vampire Survivors. It utilizes a quad-tree for efficient collision detection, enabling it to handle thousands of enemies. The game is contained within a single `game.c` file and features pixelated graphics, an upgrade system, and various enemy types.
primary_use_case: Creating a small, chaotic, and performant game inspired by Vampire Survivors.
cover_image_prompt: A lone warrior, illuminated by the soft glow of a laptop screen, bravely battles an endless horde of pixelated monsters in a minimalist arena. The warrior wields a glowing quadtree, deflecting waves of enemies with calculated precision. Digital hearts float amidst the chaos, representing health pickups. The laptop screen displays a simplified game interface with performance metrics. The scene is set in a dimly lit room, emphasizing the warrior's focus. The repository name, 'Blob Survival,' is subtly etched onto the warrior's armor. The image should be in a clean, flat design style with clear iconography and a limited color palette.

name: sshtron
readme_summary: SSHTron is a multiplayer lightcycle game accessible via SSH. Players connect to a server and control lightcycles using WASD or vim keybindings, competing against others in a digital arena. The game can be easily played on a public server or self-hosted using Go or Docker, offering a unique and accessible gaming experience.
key_features: Option to run your own copy via Go or Docker
primary_use_case: Playing a multiplayer lightcycle game through an SSH connection.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a bustling arcade where players are intensely focused on glowing light cycle games displayed on vintage arcade cabinets. Instead of joysticks, players are typing commands on old-fashioned keyboards, their fingers flying across the keys. The game screens show trails of light forming geometric patterns as players navigate the digital arena. The arcade is filled with a retro-futuristic atmosphere, with neon signs displaying the text "sshtron.zachlatta.com". Subtle UI elements are overlaid on the arcade cabinets, showing SSH connection details and game statistics. The image should be in a vibrant, 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clear details and a nostalgic feel.

name: immich
description: High performance self-hosted photo and video management solution.
readme_summary: Immich is a high-performance, self-hosted solution for managing photos and videos. It offers features like automatic backup, duplicate prevention, multi-user support, and advanced search capabilities, providing a comprehensive alternative to cloud-based photo management services.
key_features: Upload and view videos and photos
Search by metadata, objects, faces, and CLIP
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled archivist meticulously organizing countless photos and videos into labeled albums within a vast, luminous digital library. The archivist, wearing futuristic gloves, effortlessly drags and drops memories into their respective places. Holographic projections display metadata and facial recognition results, ensuring perfect categorization. Subtle UI elements float nearby, showcasing the immich logo and album thumbnails. The library is bathed in soft, warm light, creating a sense of order and accessibility. This conceptual illustration should be in a 3D isometric style, emphasizing clarity and intuitive design, with a color scheme of blues, greens, and whites.

name: siyuan
description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.
readme_summary: Siyuan is a privacy-focused, self-hosted, and fully open-source personal knowledge management software. It allows users to create and manage their knowledge base locally, offering features like markdown support, Docker hosting, and WebDAV integration. The software is designed for individuals who prioritize data privacy and control over their personal knowledge.
primary_use_case: Personal knowledge management with a focus on privacy and self-hosting.
cover_image_prompt: A scholar sitting at a large desk, organizing scattered notes and documents into a neatly structured digital knowledge base represented by a glowing, interconnected network of nodes. The scholar uses a quill that emits digital particles, transforming handwritten notes into markdown text displayed on a holographic screen. The desk is surrounded by stacks of books and research materials, subtly incorporating the repository name 'SiYuan' on a book spine. The scene is set in a sunlit library with a warm, inviting atmosphere. Small UI elements showing the SiYuan interface are subtly placed around the desk. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a vibrant color scheme.

name: letta
description: Letta (formerly MemGPT) is the stateful agents framework with memory, reasoning, and context management.
readme_summary: Letta is a framework for building stateful agents with advanced reasoning and long-term memory. It provides tools for managing agent state, interacting with agents via REST API and SDKs, and a graphical Agent Development Environment. The framework is model-agnostic, allowing integration with various LLM API backends.
primary_use_case: Building stateful agents with memory, reasoning, and context management.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing the construction of a grand library, meticulously organizing and categorizing scrolls of knowledge into easily accessible sections. The architect uses a magical quill that automatically indexes and cross-references the information. Holographic displays show connections between different concepts and ideas. The library is bathed in soft, warm light, creating an atmosphere of learning and discovery. Small UI elements display agent states and memory management processes. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: InvoiceShelf
description: Open Source Invoicing Solution for Individuals & Businesses
readme_summary: InvoiceShelf is an open-source invoicing solution that helps individuals and businesses track expenses, payments, and create professional invoices and estimates. It is a fork of Crater, focusing on stability, updates, and new features. The solution includes a web application built with Laravel and VueJS, and mobile apps built with React Native.
key_features: Mobile apps (Android and iOS - Coming Soon)
primary_use_case: Creating and managing invoices and estimates for individuals and businesses.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting invoices and estimates from raw materials like time sheets and expense reports. The artisan's workshop is filled with organized tools and glowing screens displaying financial data. Completed invoices, resembling elegant documents, are stacked neatly, ready for delivery. Subtle UI elements and data visualizations float in the background, connecting the scene to software. The workshop is bathed in warm, inviting light. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors, conveying professionalism and efficiency.

name: kdenlive
description: Free and open source video editor, based on MLT Framework and KDE Frameworks
readme_summary: Kdenlive is a free and open-source video editor that provides professional-grade video editing capabilities. It is built on the MLT Framework and KDE Frameworks, utilizing technologies like frei0r and LADSPA for video and audio effects. The primary use case is for creating and editing videos, ranging from simple home videos to complex projects.
key_features: MLT Framework for video editing functionality
Qt and KDE Frameworks 6 for GUI
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled film editor meticulously piecing together scenes from various film reels on a high-tech editing table. The editor, bathed in the soft glow of the monitor, seamlessly blends raw footage into a captivating narrative. Digital particles float around the table, representing the fluidity of video editing. A subtle UI overlay on the monitor displays the Kdenlive interface, showcasing its powerful tools. The scene is set in a modern, minimalist studio with a focus on precision and creativity. The composition is clean and focused, with a warm color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

readme_summary: This repository provides an Nginx Lua script designed to mitigate DDoS attacks. It features an 'I am Under Attack Mode' authentication page, IP and User-Agent whitelisting/blacklisting, and WAF capabilities to inspect various request components. Additionally, it offers caching, speed, and performance enhancements like query string manipulation and minification.
key_features: DDoS Authentication HTML Page (I am Under Attack Mode)
Web Application Firewall (WAF) capabilities (POST data, URL, query string, headers, cookies inspection)
Query String Sorting, Whitelisting, and Removal
Minification/Compression of JS, CSS, and HTML
primary_use_case: Protecting Nginx web servers from DDoS attacks using Lua scripting and a Javascript-based authentication puzzle.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled gatekeeper stands before a heavily fortified web server, deflecting a swarm of malicious digital arrows with a shimmering, code-woven shield. The shield glows with Lua script patterns, deflecting the DDoS attack. The gatekeeper examines each arrow, allowing only legitimate traffic to pass through the server's entrance. Small screens display real-time threat analysis and IP whitelists. The scene is set in a futuristic data center with blue and green lighting. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and clear details, emphasizing security and protection.
